statements: SELECT student_id, student_name, course_name, grade FROM virtual_classroom;
SELECT course_name, student_name, student_id, grade FROM virtual_classroom ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM virtual_classroom WHERE student_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM virtual_classroom WHERE grade >= 90;
SELECT course_name, AVG(grade) AS average_grade FROM virtual_classroom GROUP BY course_name HAVING AVG(grade) > 80;
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM virtual_classroom WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM virtual_classroom WHERE course_name = 'Math';
SELECT * FROM virtual_classroom WHERE grade > 90;
SELECT course_name, student_name FROM virtual_classroom ORDER BY student_name ASC, course_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT student_id) AS total_students FROM virtual_classroom WHERE grade < 70;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, age FROM students ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students WHERE age > 20;
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE professor = 'Dr. John Doe';
SELECT course_name, schedule FROM courses ORDER BY course_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE age > 20 ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, age FROM students WHERE birthday BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '1999-12-31';
SELECT student_id, student_name, age, birthday FROM students WHERE student_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE professor = 'Dr. Smith' ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT course_name, professor FROM courses WHERE schedule LIKE '%Monday%' ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_id, student_name, email FROM Students WHERE enrollment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_id, course_name, instructor_name FROM Courses ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Courses ON Enrollments.course_id = Courses.course_id;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(enrollment_id) AS total_enrollments FROM Enrollments GROUP BY student_id ORDER BY total_enrollments DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, email FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM Courses WHERE course_id = 2;
SELECT student_name, course_name, enrollment_date FROM Students s JOIN Enrollments e ON s.student_id = e.student_id WHERE e.course_id = 3;
SELECT student_name, course_name, enrollment_date FROM Students s JOIN Enrollments e ON s.student_id = e.student_id WHERE s.enrollment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM Students WHERE student_grade = 'A';
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM Courses ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, course_name, enrollment_date FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id;
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id WHERE grade = 'B';
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, enrolled_date FROM Students WHERE student_grade='A';
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM Courses;
SELECT * FROM Enrollments ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;

SELECT student_name, Courses.course_name, Grades.grade FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Courses ON Enrollments.course_id = Courses.course_id JOIN Grades ON Enrollments.student_id = Grades.student_id AND Enrollments.course_id = Grades.course_id WHERE Grades.grade='B';
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM Students WHERE age > 20;
SELECT student_id, name, enrollment_date FROM Students ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT course_id, course_name, instructor FROM Courses WHERE start_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT assignment_name, due_date, total_marks FROM Assignments WHERE total_marks >= 50;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE age > 20
SELECT student_id, name, gender FROM Students WHERE gender='Female' ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT assignment_id, assignment_name, total_marks FROM Assignments WHERE total_marks >= 50 ORDER BY total_marks DESC
SELECT student_id, AVG(marks_obtained) AS average_marks FROM Grades GROUP BY student_id HAVING AVG(marks_obtained) > 70

SELECT c.course_name, s.name, g.marks_obtained FROM Courses c INNER JOIN Assignments a ON c.course_id = a.course_id INNER JOIN Grades g ON a.assignment_id = g.assignment_id INNER JOIN Students s ON g.student_id = s.student_id WHERE c.start_date < '2022-01-01'
